title: Game Update 1.2.0 Released
content: We're excited to announce the release of version 1.2.0! This update includes new quests, improved graphics, and bug fixes.

title: Weekend Event: Double XP
content: Join us this weekend for a special double XP event! Log in between Friday and Sunday to earn twice the experience points.

title: Server Maintenance
content: Servers will be down for maintenance on November 7th from 2AM to 6AM UTC. We apologize for any inconvenience.
